title: Virginia Tech students use sports analytics to predict NCAA Final 4 teams - WFXRtv.com
content: Virginia Tech students use sports analytics to predict NCAA Final 4 teams  WFXRtv.com
description: BLACKSBURG, Va. (WFXR) — Virginia Tech students in Bill Roth’s ‘Introduction to Sports Media’ course spent Wednesday night finalizing their bracket predictions for the 2022 …
